roleset.name: stay in place, unsteadily

example.name: with location
example.text: He hit Roberts with his left fist in the ribs and the razor cut toward him feebly, then wobbled in mid-air.

example.name: weird usage
example.text: She stood up, pulled the coat from her shoulders and started to slide it off, then let out a high-pitched scream and I let out a low-pitched, wobbling sound like a muffler blowing out.

roleset.note: VN updated by Julia, 10/2010. Member of Vncls body_internal_motion-49, modes_of_being_with_motion-47.3

predicate.note: Frames file for 'wobble' based on sentences in brown.
